com.epoch.textbooks

Class TextContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.textbooks.TextContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatConstants, ContentConstants

    public class TextContent
extends Object
implements ContentConstants
    A piece of content in a chapter.

      • makeImageFileName

        public String makeImageFileName()
                         throws DBException
        Makes a filename that contains the image, movie, or molecule image.
        Returns:
        the new filename, which is also stored as the content in case of images or movies (but not for Marvin or Lewis images)
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • makeImageFileName

        public String makeImageFileName(String extension)
        Makes a filename that contains the image, movie, or molecule image.
        Parameters:
        extension - extension to add to the filename; empty String if should not add one
        Returns:
        the new filename, which is also stored as the content in case of images or movies (but not for Marvin or Lewis images)

      • getRelImageFileName

        public String getRelImageFileName(String extension,
                                  boolean isImageOrMovie)
        Makes a filename for an image, movie, or molecule image.
        Parameters:
        extension - extension to add to the filename; empty String if should not add one
        isImageOrMovie - true if the content is an image or a movie
        Returns:
        the new filename

      • getJmolScripts

        public String[] getJmolScripts()
        Returns the Jmol scripts in a Jmol figure.
        Returns:
        array of Jmol scripts, Jmol Javascript commands

      • getFormattedContent

        public String getFormattedContent()
        Returns the data, with hyperlinks formatted if it's text, with HTML formatting if it's a movie, resized if it's a Lewis structure.

        [link="6"]text[/link]
        [link="14.22"]text[/link]

        for links within and between chapters, respectively, where the numbers are 1-based for content or chapter and content.
        Returns:
        formatted data

      • getFormattedContent

        public String getFormattedContent(String pathToRoot)
        Returns the data, with hyperlinks formatted if it's text, with HTML formatting if it's a movie, resized if it's a Lewis structure.

        [link="6"]text[/link]
        [link="14.22"]text[/link]

        for links within and between chapters, respectively, where the numbers are 1-based for content or chapter and content.
        Parameters:
        pathToRoot - path to the application root from the page displaying the content
        Returns:
        formatted data

      • getFormattedContent

        public String getFormattedContent(String status,
                                  String pathToRoot,
                                  int width,
                                  int height)
        Returns the data, with hyperlinks formatted if it's text, with HTML formatting if it's a movie, resized if it's a Lewis structure. Hyperlinks are in one of the formats:

        [link="6"]text[/link]
        [link="14.22"]text[/link]

        for links within and between chapters, respectively, where the numbers are 1-based for content or chapter and content.
        Parameters:
        status - "read" or "write" or "preview"
        pathToRoot - path to the application root from the page displaying the content
        width - width of the video window
        height - height of the video window
        Returns:
        formatted data

      • showNoH

        public boolean showNoH()
        Gets if H atoms should not be shown in MarvinView/Sketch.
        Returns:
        true if H atoms should not be shown

      • showHeteroH

        public boolean showHeteroH()
        Gets if only H atoms on heteroatoms should be shown in MarvinView/Sketch.
        Returns:
